# API Surface: generators

*Auto-generated by Intelligent Analyzer*

| Name | Type | Description | Location |
|------|------|-------------|----------|
| parseTasksWithUSLinks | function | Parses tasks.md file and extracts all tasks grouped by User Story ID, including metadata like status, priority, dependencies, and AC linkages | spec/task-parser.ts |
| parseSpecMd | function | Parses spec.md file to extract increment metadata, user stories, and all acceptance criteria IDs | spec/spec-parser.ts |
| validateTaskLinkage | function | Validates that task US and AC references point to valid entries in spec.md | spec/task-parser.ts |
| getAllUSIds | function | Extracts all User Story IDs from a spec.md file | spec/spec-parser.ts |
| getAllACIds | function | Extracts all Acceptance Criteria IDs from a spec.md file | spec/spec-parser.ts |
| validateACBelongsToUS | function | Validates that an AC-ID belongs to the correct User Story based on ID numbering convention | spec/spec-parser.ts |
